definition: more than is needed, desired, or required, excessive indulgence
details:
adjective
- more than is needed, desired, or required
= example: more than is needed, desired, or required
= synonyms: extra
noun
- excessive indulgence
= synonyms: overindulgence
- immoderation as a consequence of going beyond sufficient or permitted limits
= synonyms: excessiveness, inordinateness
- a quantity much larger than is needed
= synonyms: surplus, surplusage, nimiety
- the state of being more than full
= synonyms: surfeit
